resume.skillmessage: Army veteran turned full stack developer, excited to grow my career by working on productive teams and consistently learning new ways to problem solve. Excited to tackle new challenges; I have particularly enjoyed building user friendly front end applications using React.

education.description: Graduated Full Stack Development Coding Camp for Veterans

testimonials.text: Dan is a very dedicated honest caring individual. I enjoyed having him around the office and I could always count on him to do the job right

testimonials.text: Dan always is great at adapting and tackling any situation that comes his way. I think that he's going to make a great Software Developer!
